Static Public Member Functions

Xenosynth.Security.Permissions Class Reference

Permissions provide a more granular way to control access to resources and features than roles. Permissions can be assigned to roles in the Xenosynth Admin. More...

static void DeletePermission (Guid permissionID)
 Deletes the Permission from the database.

Detailed Description

Permissions provide a more granular way to control access to resources and features than roles. Permissions can be assigned to roles in the Xenosynth Admin.
